page.title: 12TOURISM
page.content:
This is an ideal{tourist area,}with lovely riverside walks, open moors, woodland areas and open spaces with shallow streams, ideal for children. Many{daily visitors}come from the Sunderland area, and many others are attracted by the part of the{Wear {Valley Walk}which runs through Frosterley. There are plans to designate the whole Wear Valley as an {Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty.
Shopkeepers and the public house rely on tourists for their profits. There are a number of{summer cottages in Frosterley and in the hamlets of Hill End, White Kirkley and Bishopley.There are four small{caravan {sites,}two behind the main street in Frosterley and two in Bollihope. One of these also has chalets. All have toilets and hot and cold water.
